titleStmt.title: An exposition vpon the prophet Ionah Contained in certaine sermons, preached in S. Maries church in Oxford. By George Abbot professor of diuinitie, and maister of Vniuersitie Colledge.
titleStmt.author: Abbot, George, 1562-1633.

publicationStmt.publisher: Imprinted by Richard Field, and are to be sold by Richard Garbrand [, Oxford],

notesStmt.note: The first leaf and the last leaf are blank.
A variant of the edition lacking Garbrand's name in imprint.
Reproduction of the original in the Henry E. Huntington Library and Art Gallery.
